title: 86/387/EEC: Commission Decision of 23 July 1986 on improving the efficiency of agricultural structures in Italy in accordance with Council Regulation (EEC) No 797/85 (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 23 July 1986
on improving the efficiency of agricultural structures in Italy in accordance with Council Regulation (EEC) No 797/85
(Only the Italian text is authentic)
(86/387/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Ministerial Decree of 12 September 1985 laying down general criteria and rules for the application of Council Regulation (EEC) No 797/85 of 12 March 1985 on improving the efficiency of agricultural structures as amended by the Ministerial Decree of 26 September 1985 and by the Ministerial Decree of 26 March 1986 as well as the Prime-Ministerial Decree of 29 November 1985 amending the Decree of 2 April 1982 on guidelines for the determination of minimum subsidized interest rates for agricultural credit, as notified by the Italian Government in accordance with Article 24 (4) of Regulation (EEC) No 797/85, satisfy the conditions laid down by Regulation (EEC) No 797/85.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 23 July 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 93, 30. 3. 1985, p. 1.
